settings.editor: Located in Canoga Park, California, our R&D and manufacturing facilities make a conscious effort to work with US-based vendors whenever possible. Everything from LED boards to Enclosures, Controls and final assembly are made in-house at our facility. Backed by our outstanding reputation for customer service, we offer industry-leading warranties on all our commercial grow lights.

settings.title: We have Proudly Reduced Carbon Emissions.

settings.description_text: Our LED lighting solutions feature advancements in photobiology and spectrum control.
Designed to reduce environmental impact while maximizing growth efficiency.
Trusted by commercial growers and home cultivators alike for superior results.
Trusted by commercial growers and home cultivators alike for superior results.

settings.editor: At California LightWorks, we use the latest technology to transform indoor and greenhouse growing. Whether you're a large-scale farmer or a home grower, our smart lighting solutions help you grow healthier plants, increase yields, and save energy.
Experience the next level of horticultural lighting with California LightWorks – Leading the Way to a Greener, More Efficient Future.

settings.title: Maximizing Growth with Advanced LED Lighting Solutions

settings.editor: Enhance efficiency, optimize yields, and take full control of your grow operation with our cutting-edge LED lighting technology. Designed for success, our solutions deliver precision, energy savings, and superior plant health.

Since 2008, California LightWorks has been guided by a vision focused on the research, design, development and manufacturing of state-of-the-art commercial LED grow lights and automation equipment for greenhouse and indoor horticulture. By applying the latest advances in high efficiency, solid-state lighting and controls technology, our team provides worldwide growers new grow lights that deliver clear benefits at a competitive price.

settings.title: Designed With Your Success in Mind

settings.editor:
We are dedicated to designing and
manufacturing the best performing LED grow lights for the commercial and hobby growers.

settings.title: Take Control Of Your Grow Operation

settings.editor: As a much more energy-efficient light source, our indoor grow lights focus the emitted light energy on the bands of the light spectrum that plants absorb the most.

Enhance efficiency, optimize yields, and take full control of your grow operation with our cutting-edge LED lighting technology. Designed for success, our solutions deliver precision, energy savings, and superior plant health.
